name: Surreal Escape
description:
Welcome to this surreal world filled with tricky puzzles, bizarre rooms and most important - locked doors!
As you might realize your mission is to find the way to open each and every door and escape!
Are you ready to accept this challenge?

  • Features ?
    ↗ 50 locked doors!
    ↗ Epic brain teasers
    ↗ Amazing logic puzzles
    ↗ Futuristic graphics
    ↗ Outside of the box thinking
    ↗ Last but not least - Free!

  • How to play ?
    ↗ Find and combine items
    ↗ Solve mini-puzzles

  • Mission ?
    ↗ Escape!
